name: Rhino Beetle Simulator
description:
*****Rhino Beetle Simulator*****

Do you love beetles? The much better looking cousin of the cockroach. The Rhino Beetles are here!! Control your very own beetle in this huge insect world. Create your colony, feed the king, find Worker and attack Coleoptera, and go out in search of the insect bosses. The ultimate winged insect simulator you have been looking for. High quality 3D graphics,
Super gameplay, and smooth controls.

Enter the insect world as a spider and build your colony. Finding worker spiders will help to establish your colony. When you find all 6, the Rhino Beetle King will arrive. When your colony is large enough, the king will arrive. You will also find yourself in head to head battles against Ant colonies, Spiders, Ladybugs, Butterflies, Wasp, and Honey Bees, and Scorpion.

Top Game Features:
--Huge 3D Insect World Map
--Open World Style RPG game
-- Fast paced and action packed animal simulator
-- High quality graphics and realistic map
-- Part survival and part animal simulator
-- Call your colony members when you are near your enemies
-- Realistic wild insect sound effects and real weather effects


Instructions to play:

Part 1 : Build your Beetle Colony
--Find 6 Worker
--Find 6 Attack Spiders
--Feed your King Scarab

Part 2 : Find and Defeat the Bosses
--Bosses include Giant Ants, Ladybug, Butterfly, Bees, Spider, and Scorpion.

Part 3 : Defeat the enemy Beetle Clans

Part 4 : Find and Defeat the Super Bosses

Be sure to check us out on Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames

Thanks for all the awesome feedback Wildfooters! We are super excited about our most recent insect series of games - aptly named "Insecto". Be sure to send us an email at wildfootwork1@gmail.com and let us know how we are doing. Thanks for playing, good luck!!
